channel.title: CVE Feed for Codeboxr -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Codeboxr -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47240|2024-08-02T21:09:35.804Z -- codeboxr -- cbx%20map%20for%20google%20map%20%26%20openstreetmap
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Codeboxr CBX Map for Google Map & OpenStreetMap plugin <= 1.1.11 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-28747|2024-08-02T13:51:37.058Z -- codeboxr -- cbx%20currency%20converter
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in codeboxr CBX Currency Converter plugin <= 3.0.3 versions.
